directions: In a food processor chop fine the garlic, the lime, the scallions, and the chili, add the lime juice, the tomatoes, the oil, and the coriander, and purée the mixture. Serve the salsa with tortilla chips or with grilled meat or fish.
ingredients: 1 lime, the peel cut away with a serrated knife
1/2 Scotch bonnet chili (available at specialty produce markets) or 1 serrano chili, seeded (wear rubber gloves)
1 tablespoon fresh lime juice, or to taste
6 large plum tomatoes, seeded and chopped
title: Scotch Bonnet Tomato Salsa
